## Program Areas

:::{.card-grid}
::: {.info-card}
### Epidemiology and Surveillance
Disease surveillance design, outbreak support, risk assessment, and rapid analytics for action.
:::

::: {.info-card}
### Non-Communicable Disease Prevention
Research and interventions on hypertension, diabetes, nutrition, and lifestyle-risk reduction.
:::

::: {.info-card}
### Maternal, Child, and Adolescent Health
Community programs, nutrition assessment, school health, and implementation support.
:::

::: {.info-card}
### Environmental and Occupational Health
Assessment of climate, workplace exposure, and environmental determinants of health.
:::

::: {.info-card}
### One Health and Emerging Infections
Integrated human-animal-environment public health approaches for emerging threats.
:::

::: {.info-card}
### Education and Capacity Building
Training, mentorship, and workforce support for students and public health professionals.
:::
:::

## How We Work

1. Assess local context and public health priorities
2. Co-design interventions with community and institutional partners
3. Implement with clear monitoring indicators
4. Measure outcomes and continuously improve
